original_text: But some seeds fell on good soil. Good strong plants grew from these seeds. Some plants made 30 new seeds. Some plants made 60 new seeds. And some plants made 100 new seeds.’
korean_text: 더러는 좋은 땅에 떨어지매 자라 무성하여 결실하였으니 삼십 배나 육십 배나 백 배가 되었느니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: But some seeds fell on good soil
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 씨앗들은 좋은 토양에 떨어졌습니다

sentences.original_text: Good strong plants grew from these seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 이 씨앗들에서 좋고 튼튼한 식물들이 자랐습니다

sentences.original_text: And some plants made 100 new seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 식물들은 100개의 새 씨앗을 만들었습니다
